players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I found last night. He killed Diana."
Bob: "I have no information to share at this time."
Bob: "I have an alibi for Night 1. I was in my house, unable to move or make any noise due to a strange illness. I couldn't attend the meeting at the town square that night."
You: "I think Charlie is the mafioso, not Bob. I noticed that Charlie was acting suspiciously when he said 'Bob is the mafioso'."
Charlie: "I'm not the mafioso. I found Bob's alibi suspicious, but that doesn't mean he's telling the truth. We should investigate further."
